description.english: Open communications with the Kyraine
Claim the Tserilecx and build an empire.
Hydrogen powers the universe.
Build your first celestial mine.

Progress in fighting through the Cetus combat trials.
Gather rare resources to help Amast build rare things.
Bane was driven back in the Misiient system.
Bomar is working on a celestial scanner that can scan an entire system.
Help Cernaw close the anomalies in Tord.
Disable the Toreisan defense platforms in Antea.
Contact the Onocai named Praeter in Mora.
Amast asked that we contact the leader of the Avar, Taden.
Sargrum of the Avar needs a deep scan of the Thetan anomaly.
Wile is searching for an ancient stardock somewhere in Avar space.
Use the Hohlrom device to create a mini-star.
Lof's Hohlrom research needs resources.
Lune needs help sealing the wild rift in Guibus.
Find Maelir and the source of the anomalies.
Nez is working to create more powerful ship reactors.
Amast repaired the design flaws in the Saurum planet engine.
Find Wile's prototype ship in Rebus
Find more information on the Ecxos planetary station.
Disable the Toreisan defense platforms in Centra.
Contact the Avar named Vertec in Antea.
Trade Deca for engine upgrade plans.
Deca has five lux to trade.
Deph needs helping mining the resources in Arae.
Dera has engine alpha upgrade software for trade.
Deren needs five celestial sensors deployed.
Dereto needs help updating his shields.
Use the Astralecx and 256 exolux to seal the Thetan anomaly.
Find the Cetus ambassador in Avar space.
Search north of Osti for spatial distruptions.
Dirn can upgrade the engine alpha software to engine beta.
Contact Devoran in Thetan.
Scan Dolan's two wrecks in Thetan.
Build a stardock in Thetan for the Cetus.
Rheel wants to perform an experiment that could pacify wild creatures.
Rhigen needs specific resources gathered in exchange for information on this region.
Recover Sterus' derelict ship from Arae.
Svem is trying to neutralize five spatial anomalies.
Disable the Toreisan defense platforms in Ius.
Contact Dolan in the Cetus Thetan System.
Three Onocai research ships went missing in Lystran.
The Kyraine is near the jump point in Osti.
An advanced race is helping the Saurum change gravity throughout Lystran.
Disable all Toreisan ships and stations in Mora.
Gather 256 exolux from the systems surrounding Antea.
Asor deployed a prototype mine in Tord that went rouge.
Disable the Toreisan defense platforms in Scae.
Clore needs three comets moved in the Curre system.
Como's ship was wrecked near a Gas Giant Attepa in Ambiu.
Contact the Saurum named Nanta.
Gek needs help closing an anomaly in Volri.
Disable the gravity station in Saurum Lacu.
Build a high reputation with the Saurum.
Defend Gek from the attacking Elpin.
Nanta needs the moon Caulisou moved to Beacon Alpha in Caulis.
Pore needs the anomaly in Caulis closed.
Pore is busy and needs the Elpin removed from Caulis.
Renan is working on an auxiliary system that will increase weapon arcs.
Find and recover parts from the jump drive fragments.
Close the five spatial anomalies in Saurum space.
Scan UNN210 for Sloar.
Sloar requires a stardock with level 2 factory.
Strak needs to close the anomaly in Celor.
Strak needs iron, carbon, and tormaline.
Tur needs a way to repel or remove the wild creatures in Celor.
Tur needs tormaline, uranium, cadmium, and paladium for an experiment.
Help Hullust mine and collect resources in Thetan.
